{"type":"tool_use","timestamp":1771656858900,"sessionID":"ses_381067eadffePb1jcwxGYqR9UV","part":{"id":"prt_c7efa4d0b0017GGE3iBeQsQp19","sessionID":"ses_381067eadffePb1jcwxGYqR9UV","messageID":"msg_c7ef98193001NY8DRTycqoSDOG","type":"tool","callID":"call_68894a9dac5143fb921037c1","tool":"write","state":{"status":"error","input":{"content":"FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    build-essential \
    libgl1 \
    libglib2.0-0 \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY requirements.txt ./

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir \
    --extra-index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu \
    -r requirements.txt \
    --target=/app/deps

COPY download_model.py ./
RUN PYTHONPATH=/app/deps python download_model.py

FROM python:3.11-slim AS production

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    libgl1 \
    libglib2.0-0 \
    wget \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN addgroup --system appgroup && adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

COPY --from=builder /app/deps /app/deps
COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt /app/model.pt

COPY . .

ENV PYTHONPATH=/app/deps

EXPOSE 8000

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/ml-inference"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service with FastAPI"

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=30s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

USER appuser

CMD ["python", "-m", "uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
